title: Jimmy Lai, Hong Kong pro-democracy figure, sentenced to 20 years in prison for national security offences
description: Sentencing of media tycoon is the culmination of a years-long saga that critics say represents Hong Kong’s transformation from a mostly free city to one where dissent is fiercely suppressed
content:
Jimmy Lai, a once mighty media mogul and prominent pro-democracy activist, has been sentenced to 20 years in prison in Hong Kong for national security offences.

title: Stephen Miller: The aide driving Donald Trump's most controversial policies
description: The high-velocity start to 2026 by the Trump administration has cemented Stephen Miller's position as one of its most powerful figures.
content:
For years Stephen Miller has been a conservative firebrand in Donald Trump's political orbit. Now, he has become a lightning rod.

title: Universities told to report foreign interference on campus to MI5
description: Ministers say UK universities have become a "prime target for foreign states and hostile actors".
content:
University bosses have been told by ministers to report threats of foreign interference directly to the government and security services.

title: AI gold rush sees tech firms embracing 72-hour weeks
description: In the race for AI, tech firms are asking for their staff to work long hours. But there are risks, experts say.
content:
